name: hubot-pushbot
description: PushBot implementation for hubot which is: "PushBot is an IRC bot that manages the topic in an IRC channel that has a push train."

scripts.install: $(npm bin)/tsc --module commonjs -t ES5 index.ts && $(npm bin)/tsc --module commonjs --out src/pushbot-out.js -t ES5 src/pushbot.ts && cat COMMANDS.txt src/pushbot-out.js > src/pushbot.js && rm src/pushbot-out.js
